content: bring rustic charm to your holiday decor with this crochet farmhouse tree ornament it s perfect for adding a warm countryside touch to your tree farmhouse tree ornament crochet along video right hand farmhouse tree https //youtu be/r7wx3efkzpa left hand farmhouse tree https //youtu be/7u9n7d5tsle beginners to advanced crocheters can create this pattern with the following techniques -magic_ring -single_crochet single_crochet -slip_stitch slip_stitch -chain chain -fastening off the pattern is written in u s crochet terms complete with clear instructions and pictures to help you along the way farmhouse tree ornament is crocheted in the round/continuous spirals without joining the rounds i suggest using a stitch marker or different color yarn to keep track of each round farmhouse tree ornament is crocheted in worsted weight yarn and is approximately 2 5 inches tall be aware that size may vary depending on the yarn and hook size used gauge is not particularly important just be consistent with the gauge you are using and most importantly have fun supplies needed for this pattern worsted weight yarn e 3 5mm f 3 75mm or g 4mm crochet hook yarn/darning needle scissors locking stitch markers fabric glue optional faux leather string optional twine optional join my ravelry group so i can get to know you better https //www ravelry com/groups/yarn-society do not distribute sell or share this pattern please feel free to sell the items you make from this shop
